transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Himanshu sir Anurag baat kar raha tha main IndiaMART se available ho aap do minute ke liye?
Customer: Haan ji bolo.
Executive: Haan sir aap se last time baat hua tha aapne bola ki IndiaMART mein thoda ek baar aap kuch kehna tha kuch aap lead vagarah use nahi kar rahe hain kuch issue aa rahi thi kya abhi?
Customer: Hello. Lead properly nahi aa rahi hai jo product dale hain wo dikhata hi nahi hai show hi nahi kar raha kya hai wo.
Executive: Sir product usme sir category vagarah hi sir aapne add hi nahi kiye last time bhi aap se iske bare mein baat ho rahi thi fir aap driving kar rahe the baat ho nahi payi thi agar aap mujhe bata do add kar deta hu usme kafi cheeze reh gayi wo jo isme blank hi padi hui hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Dalo add karo. Sir jaise aapka ek JBL ka bill karte ho night club sound system karke hai hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to iski kya iski jo category hai wo puri missing hai iski category kya aati hai?
Customer: Club.
Executive: Hello. Club ki club ki category. Achcha club mein aayega ye sir isme dal sakte hain kya aap wireless sound system mein?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Wireless club club services mein jayega na to ye?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai ye aapka ho gaya aur dusra sir aapka rahega carrier karke hai cold store room ka. Haan. Haan to iska kya hai category sir actually kya hai na sir bina jab category add nahi hogi to lead aapke paas nahi jayegi isliye main bol raha tha sir iska kya rahega?
Customer: Cold storage room ki rahegi category.
Executive: Sir iska ho sakta hai cold storage room?
Customer: Haan usme dal do theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur sir ye ek aapka aur bhi rahega aapka stainless steel ka hai duct insulation system hai.
Customer: Haan iska sir kya rahega waise?
Executive: Duct ka rahega.
Executive: Duct insulation sir isme kar sakte hain kya aap duct AC mein?
Customer: Duct AC mein dal do.
Executive: Duct AC mein ho gaya aapka theek hai aur ek sir last ek aapka aata hai aapka inline toilet fan hai. Haan. Haan to ye sir kis mein aata hai aapka inline toilet fan?
Customer: Ye ventilation mein. Theek hai aur sir sir ek ka sir price bata do aap aapka toilet ventilation system ka jo price hai wo isme aa raha hai incorrect wo sir pricing kya hai abhi? Kiska? Toilet ventilation system. Wo sir depend karta hai project to project alag alag. Sir isme 140 rupees piece pada hua hai ye kaise kya galat hai na ye to? Haan. Sir iska ya to main price aap remove kar doge sir ye kafi kam price hai aur aapki sir last sari prices 3 lakh ke upar ki hai aapke sir 140 rupees ki aap mujhe bata sakte ho approx kya hai ya fir isko hataiye yahan se pricing iski? Oro ka kya dala hua hai isme? Oro ka pricing check karke batao. Sir pricing is pricing iski aapki 140 dali hui thi. Meri taraf 140 dali hai oro ka kya dala hua hai ye batao. Ek minute ek minute ek minute ek minute aapka air ventilation system mein hai ye. Aur sir ek last time jo aap se discussion hua tha aapko bol rahe the kuch address vagarah change karna tha ho gaya tha kya wo? Nahi abhi nahi hua. Wo sir wo aapke end pe hi ho sakta hai aapka ek Dehradun ki koi company hai composite aircon karke hai main inka check kar le raha hu ek baar. Sir abhi sir lead kahan consume kar rahe ho waise aap? Haan? Abhi aap lead kahan consume kar rahe ho? Abhi aa rahi hai. Sir matlab use kar rahe hain ya nahi kyunki sir aapko dekh raha tha lead consumption bilkul bhi down ho gayi thi. Nahi use nahi kar rahe lead. Sir yahi ho raha tha kya hai ki kuch categories ki wajah se lead aapke paas ja nahi rahi hai aur lead aap wahan pe use bhi nahi kar pa rahe ho toilet ventilation. Theek hai sir inki sir pricing to missing hai price bhi add nahi kiya hua hai isliye main puch raha tha ki pricing dal saku to. Nahi kisi aur ne bhi nahi pricing dal rakhi hai? Nahi ek ka main dekh raha tha ki aapke paas Dehradun ka hi hai ek dusri company theek hai usne bhi uski pricing missing hi hai. To agar aap usme add karna chaho to add kar dete hain nahi to pricing ka kya rahega wo to agar lead aapke paas aati hai to samne se discuss kar sakte ho aap pricing ka. Haan to pricing hata do fir. Chalo aapka ye wali pricing hata gaya baki 10 ke aas pass aise hain jisme pricing aapki incorrect hi hai. To wo bhi sahi kar do. Ek minute abhi do minute de do bas aapka ha ek aapka rahega sir general ductable AC karke hai ek. Haan. Iska pricing abhi aapka isme hai 40000 per ton. To kya ye iska kya change karna hai iska ye per piece mein aayega na? Hata do pehle. Nahi aapka 40000 isme per ton mein hai to piece mein kar sakte hain na isko? Pricing hata do iska. Pricing hata de ductable AC ki pricing hi hata de chalo iska hata diya maine dusra aapka aa gaya polyester white dome karke hai. Hmm. Aapke 7000 per square feet ka hai. Theek hai ye aapka square feet isko piece ki kar de raha hu. Ye hata do product hi hata do. Ye product acha tent house ka? Haan remove kar do. Chalo ye aapka ho gaya deactivate aur ek aapka aata hai carrier central AC karke hai air conditioner. Haan iska aapka pricing jo hai wo 27000 per ton hai to kya per piece pe kar sakte hain isko? Nahi. Achcha ye same hi rahega nahi iska jo unit hai na wo haan. Ji ji batao aap. Unit rate dal do. Unit ka rate dal do. Unit per piece ka ho gaya theek hai ye ho gaya aapka ek aapka aata hai Hitachi central AC karke. Daloge na aap rate yada badha do isko rate. Rate aap isme kar do 50000. To 27 se 50 kar du main? 50000 50000. Chalo main kar diya ye 50 aapka 50000 per piece ho gaya aapka dusra sir aapka last time ek hai Hitachi karke Hitachi central AC ka. Haan. To iska bhi change hoga abhi 30000 per ton ka dikha raha tha. Haan ton se hata ke piece kar do 50000. To sir isme ye to kar de na baki sir iske sath main aapko kuch lead whatsapp pe share kar du agar aap dekh pao to. Abhi sir location mujhe aap bol do theek hai kya rahega na ki main usi ke hisab se fir aapko main lead nikalunga state of IndiaMART se shayad aap wahan se use bhi karte hoge aap. Theek hai main aapke haan ji. Aap note karo main bata raha hu city kon kon si lead chahiye mujhe. Chalo ek minute haan batao aap. Mujhe ek to lead chahiye Saharanpur. Saharanpur theek hai. Dehradun. Theek hai Saharanpur Dehradun ho gaya aapka. Rudki Haridwar. Rudki Haridwar ho gaya. Yamunanagar. Achcha Yamunanagar. Hmm. Yamunanagar. Sir main aisa nahi hai ki aapke paas main pure UP aur UK ki lead send kar du? Haan? Aapko main Delhi NCR ka ho gaya pura aur aapka UK ka matlab Uttarakhand pura aur pura aapko main UP ka lead main aapko in sari lead kar do Haryana kar do. Haryana haan bilkul bilkul UP aur Uttarakhand teen state kar do bahut hai. Delhi ka nahi kar rahe kya abhi aap? Kya cheez? Delhi ka deal nahi kar rahe kya Delhi ki? Delhi ki kar rahe hain Delhi bhi kar do. Chalo main aapko na abhi 10 minute ke andar kuch lead share karta hu ek baar whatsapp jarur check kar lijiyega theek hai? Theek hai ji okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads not generating properly.

- Product categories not added.

- Incorrect pricing on some products.

- Address change pending.



Resolution:

- Updated product categories.

- Removed incorrect pricing.

- Agreed to send leads via WhatsApp.

- Noted cities for lead generation.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share leads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, pricing, address change, whatsapp
